ch.se.inf.ethz.jcd.batman.controller

Interface TaskController

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    SynchronizedTaskController
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RemoteSynchronizedTaskController, RemoteTaskController

    public interface TaskController
    Controller (as in MVC-Pattern) interface for a virtual disk file browser. This interface is based around Task to allow concurrent executions. In other words: every command executable on a virtual disk is wrapped inside a Task instance.

    • Method Detail

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        Indicates if the controller is connected to a virtual disk.
        Returns:
        true if the controller is connected to a disk, otherwise false

      • addDiskEntryListener

        void addDiskEntryListener(DiskEntryListener listener)
        Adds an observer to the controller.
        Parameters:
        listener - the observer to add

      • removeDiskEntryListener

        void removeDiskEntryListener(DiskEntryListener listener)
        Removes an observer from the controller.
        Parameters:
        listener - the observer to remove

      • createImportTask

        UpdateableTask<Void> createImportTask(String[] sourcePaths,
                                    Path[] destinationPath)
        Creates a task to import the given paths into the given destinations.
        Parameters:
        sourcePaths - an array of source paths on the current system
        destinationPath - an array of destinations inside the virtual disk
        Returns:
        the task to execute the import

      • createExportTask

        UpdateableTask<Void> createExportTask(Entry[] sourceEntries,
                                    String[] destinationPaths)
        Creates a task to export the given entries into the given destinations.
        Parameters:
        sourceEntries - an array of entries inside the virtual disk to export
        destinationPaths - an array of paths on the current system representing the target of an export
        Returns:
        the task to execute the export

      • createMoveTask

        UpdateableTask<Void> createMoveTask(Entry[] sourceEntries,
                                  Path[] destinationPaths)
        Creates a task to move entries to new locations. This task can also be used to rename entries.
        Parameters:
        sourceEntries - an array of entries inside the virtual disk which should be moved to a new location
        destinationPaths - an array of paths for the virtual disk, representing the destinations of the move
        Returns:
        the task to execute the move

      • createCopyTask

        UpdateableTask<Void> createCopyTask(Entry[] sourceEntries,
                                  Path[] destinationPaths)
        Creates a task to copy entries.
        Parameters:
        sourceEntries - an array of entries which should be copied
        destinationPaths - an array of destinations for the copies
        Returns:
        the task to execute the copy

        Returns:
        the task to execute the deletion

        Creates a task to get the children of a directory.
        Parameters:
        directory - the parent of the returned child entries
        Returns:
        task to execute the query

      • createConnectTask

        UpdateableTask<Void> createConnectTask(boolean createNewIfNecessary)
        Creates a task to connect to virtual disk
        Parameters:
        createNewIfNecessary - indicates if a new disk should be created, if it does not exist. True if a new one should be created, otherwise false
        Returns:
        task to execute the connection

      • createDisconnectTask

        UpdateableTask<Void> createDisconnectTask()
        Creates a task to disconnect to the virtual disk
        Returns:
        task to execute the disconnect

      • createSearchTask

        UpdateableTask<Entry[]> createSearchTask(String term,
                                       boolean isRegex,
                                       boolean checkFiles,
                                       boolean checkFolders,
                                       boolean isCaseSensitive,
                                       boolean checkChildren,
                                       Entry... parents)
        Creates a task to search for the given term inside the given parents.
        Parameters:
        term - the search term
        isRegex - true if term is a regex, otherwise false
        checkFiles - true if files should be checked
        checkFolders - true if folders should be checked
        isCaseSensitive - true if term is case sensitive
        checkChildren - true if children and subfolders should be checked
        parents - list of parents to search in
        Returns:
        task to execute the search

        UpdateableTask<Void> createDeleteDiskTask()
